extends ConcurrencyManager.Options
    Additional properties understood by this test.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String ABORT_RATE
      The #of clients that choose to abort a transaction rather the committing it [0.0:1.0].

      The length of the keys used in the test.
      static String NCLIENTS
      The #of concurrent clients to run.

      • NTRIALS

        static final String NTRIALS
        The #of trials (aka transactions) to run.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • KEYLEN

        static final String KEYLEN
        The length of the keys used in the test. This directly impacts the likelyhood of a write-write conflict. Shorter keys mean more conflicts. However, note that conflicts are only possible when there are at least two concurrent clients running.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • NOPS

        static final String NOPS
        The #of operations in each trial.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ABORT_RATE

        static final String ABORT_RATE
        The #of clients that choose to abort a transaction rather the committing it [0.0:1.0].
